--- Part 2 ---

```{r}

# nflfastR's custom mode, thanks Seb
mode_min <- function (x, na.rm = TRUE){
    if (na.rm) {
        x <- x[!is.na(x)]
    }
    ux <- unique(x)
    return(ux[which.min(tabulate(match(x, ux)))])
}

apply(input,2,mode_min) |> paste(collapse = "")

```
